story:
En dag när syskonen Edessa och Tobil tar en genväg genom skogen träffar de den magiska Eken Helaneh och dess trogne vän Ekorren Sabah. Syskonen får veta att något skadar skogens djur och Helaneh vädjar om barnens hjälp för att ta reda på vad det är som sker. Med hjälp av Helanehs magi och Sabahs guidning ger de sig ut på ett oförglömligt äventyr genom skog och sjö för att rädda liv. Kommer de att klara det innan tiden är ute?

Helaneh och den magiska skogen är en spännande berättelse som dessutom är fullspäckad med intressanta fakta om naturen. Med denna bok vill vi engagera och inspirera alla att värna om vår planet.

Boken riktar sig till 6-9-åringar, men passar även äldre barn samt som högläsningsbok för de lite yngre. Utgivningen är planerad till september 2021, men redan nu kan Du förbeställa ett signerat exemplar (eller två)!
 

För att kunna ge ut och sprida den här boken till alla Sveriges barn behöver vi Din hjälp. Utgivningen kommer att kosta 38 000 kr med tryck och övriga nödvändiga utgifter. Genom att förbeställa ett exemplar, eller kanske till och med två, eller bidra med en valfri summa, kan du hjälpa oss att göra skillnad på riktigt!

Målet med utgivningen är att sprida kunskap om hur vi kan bidra till att påverka miljön, samt öka medvetenheten om vilka konsekvenser nedskräpning (både det synliga och det som inte syns) har för djuren och naturen. Vi vill genom boken uppmuntra och engagera barn och deras familjer att göra egna miljöinsatser såsom skräpplockning och plogging, och bidra till att de lägger märke till nedskräpningen i sin närmiljö. 

Berättelsen är utformad som ett spännande mysterium med moralen och etiken att vi måste ta hand om vår natur och att det ligger på allas ansvar att göra så. Givetvis tar även vi vårt ansvar genom att trycka boken med miljöcertifierat papper (FSC) och samarbeta med företag som arbetar kontinuerligt med hållbarhet.

Tusen Förlag arbetar aktivt med att öka mångfald och inkludering i barnlitteraturen.
Med den här boken tar vi avstånd från den vithetsnorm som råder inom fantasy- och barnböcker. Huvudkaraktärerna i Helaneh och den magiska skogen har assyriska/syrianska namn och är mörkhyade. Mångfald och representation i barnlitteraturen är något som gynnar alla.

Författaren Robel Malki har assyriskt/syrianskt ursprung och kom till Sverige som flyktingbarn, och illustratören Selina Malik har påbrå från Bangladesh, Tyskland och Tjeckien. Båda har själva upplevt avsaknaden av karaktärer som liknar dem i barnböcker, både som barn och nu även som föräldrar. Läs mer om Robel och Selina i styckena nedan.

Vi hoppas att ni vill hjälpa oss och stödja utgivningen så att så många barn som möjligt kan ta del av denna spännande berättelse med ett så viktigt budskap!
 

I listan till höger hittar du olika sätt att bidra.

Du kan förbeställa en bok för 150 kr, eller två böcker för 280 kr, givetvis signerade av författare och illustratör. Du kan till exempel köpa boken både till dig själv och till en vän. 

Om du vill ha ännu fler böcker kan du välja bland de olika paketen med 3, 4, 5 eller 10 exemplar, eller lägga till Add-Ons med 1 eller 2 böcker extra. Läs mer om Add-Ons nedan.

BONUS! För varje sålt exemplar kommer vi att plantera ett träd. Snacka om att göra skillnad på riktigt!

Vid beställning av 1 bok tillkommer frakt på 55 kr. 
Vid beställning av 2-4 böcker tillkommer frakt på 65 kr.
Vid beställning av 5 eller fler böcker bjuder vi på frakten! (Obs! Gäller endast om du väljer 5x eller 10x som förstahandsval.)

För dig som vill göra ännu mer skillnad kan du välja en perk där du får ett signerat exemplar av "Helaneh och den magiska skogen" och ger ett extra bidrag för något av följande:
- En donering till Barncancerfonden eller Naturskyddsföreningen
- Ett skräpplockarkit från Håll Sverige Rent
- Plantera 3 träd till
(Vi planterar träd genom att donera en summa till ViSkogen.)

Om du vill stödja projektet utan att köpa någon bok kan du antingen använda den rosa "Back it"-knappen längst upp i kampanjen och skriva in en valfri summa, eller välja vår färdiga Stöd-perk där du kan bidra med  250 kr.
 

Är du intresserad av flera perks? 
Det går tyvärr inte att kombinera de perks som syns här på sidan. Däremot kan du alltid lägga till fler produkter och/eller bidrag till ditt perk. Detta gör du genom att välja den perk som intresserar dig mest. När du har tryckt vidare kan du lägga till fler Add-Ons.

Då kan du t.ex. lägga till en eller två böcker till, plantera fler träd eller skicka ett extra bidrag.
 

Robel Malki bor tillsammans med sin hustru och 3 barn i Stockholm, där han dessutom jobbar som läkare. Skrivandet har dock alltid varit en av hans största passioner och något som han länge har gjort vid sidan av.   

I sin debutbok Edessa och Tobil - Helaneh och den magiska skogen kombinerar Robel fiktion med fakta, närmare bestämt fantasy och naturkunskap. Hans texter innehåller en härlig blandning av viktiga och lärorika budskap med poetiska och humoristiska inslag.
 

Selina Malik är född och uppvuxen i Lund där hon bor med sin fästman, son och hund. Selina är idag verksam som illustratör, fotograf och miljöstrateg inom offentlig sektor. För henne är det viktigt att kunna kombinera den kreativa sidan med miljöarbetet på lokal nivå.  

Selinas illustrationer kännetecknas av fantasi, humor och natur. Hon illustrerar huvudsakligen i akvarell med inslag av bläck och gouache, men målar även i andra medium såsom oljefärg, akrylfärg och digitala illustrationer.

 

Tänk om det vore möjligt att skapa en positiv förändring i världen, kanske inte idag eller ens imorgon, men längre fram, när våra barn och barnbarn har vuxit upp och tagit över våra roller och världen. Hur vill vi att det ska se ut då? Och vad kan vi göra nu för att påverka det då?

Detta är frågor och funderingar som har format det som nu har blivit Tusen förlag. Ett förlag med ambitionen att sträva efter jämställdhet och likabehandling, gemenskap och inkludering, mångfald och normbrytande. Vi tror på att barnen är vår framtid, och det bästa sättet att skapa långsiktig förändring är genom att skapa för dem.

På Tusen förlag strävar vi efter att skapa kunskap och underhållning för barn, för att de i framtiden ska kunna ha mer än en, två eller till och med tusen möjligheter!
 

Tusen Förlag är ett litet och nystartat förlag, och denna bok kommer att vara bland de första som ges ut på förlaget. Sedan Tiara Norlin grundade Tusen Förlag, år 2017, har hon fortsatt att vidareutbilda sig och samlat både kunskap och erfarenhet i branschen för att säkerställa att förlaget håller samma standard och kvalitet som vilket annat förlag som helst. 

Om vi inte når det mål vi har satt för denna kampanj kommer de insamlade pengarna ändå att gå till att trycka en så stor upplaga som möjligt. Därmed kan vi garantera att de böcker som förbeställs här kommer att produceras inom den satta tidsramen.

Skulle vi samla in mer än det mål vi har satt går allt överskott till Tusen Förlag för att finansiera ytterligare upplagor av samma bok och/eller till framtida utgivningar på förlaget.

Under denna kampanj och fram till och med utgivningen kommer vi att arbeta öppet med många uppdateringar både här på kampanjsidan samt på vår hemsida och digitala medier. Länkar till dessa hittar du i presentationen längst upp på sidan.
 

Dela gärna kampanjen i sociala medier så att vi kan nå ut till fler. 

Du kan även tipsa ditt bibliotek eller din bokhandel om Edessa och Tobil - Helaneh och den magiska skogen så att den blir tillgänglig för fler barn.

Följ oss på facebook och instagram för att säkerställa att du inte missar något.

Tusen Förlag
Hemsida: www.tusenforlag.se
Facebook: www.facebook.com/tusenforlag
Instagram: www.instagram.com/tusenforlag

Robel Malki (Författare)
Instagram: www.instagram.com/ropilm

Selina Malik (Illustratör)
Hemsida: www.selinamalik.se
Facebook: www.facebook.com/selinamalik.se
Instragram: www.instagram.com/selinamalik.se

Tiara Norlin (Grundare på Tusen Förlag)
Instagram: www.instagram.com/tiara.norlin

story:
This book and perks ship in July 2021

Living in the Los Angeles wasteland can be tough – especially when you’re just some dude whose only real skill is computer hacking. So, Artie Gonzalez spends most of his days building drones, modifying his bi-polar robot girlfriend, and scavenging for his next pair of Chuck Taylors.

Artie watched the world end ten years ago. That was after the famous programmer Satoshi Nakamoto, released the world’s first sentient artificial intelligence. Now planet Earth is a dump and Artie has finally accepted that fact, doing what any other respectable tech-nerd might do in his situation – build a post-apocalyptic man-cave.

But the world is much different than he thinks. He’ll soon learn that thugs, raiders, and the occasional mutant are the least of his concerns. Something terrible is making its way from the east, kidnapping humans and rendering cities desolate – and Artie may be the only one with the skills to stop it.

With the help of some new friends, Artie is about to embark upon the quest of a lifetime – and maybe earn some Bitcoin along the way.

 

 

The images above are some artist renditions of the world of The Last Hacker. There is so much more to the book! More places and characters and adventures!

The book will come in these formats:

  • Ebook: .mobi, .epub,. PDF (Supports Kindle, Nook, iBooks, Android)
  • Softcover (High-quality paperback)
  • Audiobook (MP3 download and App Experience)

Both Ebook and Audiobook are DRM free through this campaign.

The thing I am MOST excited about is the audiobook. I don't have time to read books--I run a company, write books, and have six kids. Audiobooks are the only way for me.

Most crowdfunding book campaigns and most books, in general, don't launch with audio. That isn't the case with this book.

The Last Hacker will launch the audiobook at the same time the ebook and print books launch.

Some of you want DRM (Digital Rights Management) free books. So, I'm going to give you the MP3s to download. But this is an AWFUL experience.

So, I've built an iOS and Android app that will give you an AMAZING listening experience for The Last Hacker (I can do this because I'm a programmer and have a team of programmers)

Remember, by backing this project now you will get this book many months in advance of its public launch. No need to wait until winter for this to come to Audible.

You can read or listen to the first chapter here. 

CLICK HERE TO READ THE FIRST CHAPTER

Note: These have only received one pass at editing and don't reflect the final version.

 Click the image below to listen to the audiobook

 

 

We've got a chatroom where you can hang out and talk about the book, the campaign, writing, fiction, whatever. 

CLICK HERE to join.

story:
The 7 Forms of Respect™ is a framework for understanding how to give and ask for respect in a way that facilitates productive communication and collaboration.

I’m Dr. Julie Pham and I've developed the 7 Forms of Respect™. I have 15+ years of experience bringing people of diverse backgrounds together. A lot of my personal experience has informed my research. I grew up in a bicultural household, American at school, Vietnamese at home. I’ve lived in five different countries. I’ve built partnerships among unlikely allies across ethnic, social-economic, industry, and political divides. I’ve worked in academia, at my family’s Vietnamese newspaper, in tech companies, and with nonprofits.

I’ve lived in rapidly changing communities where new and different perspectives have created cultural clashes. We’ve seen how social media and remote work can make it easy to judge those we don’t know as we emerge from the pandemic. And now we are making snap judgments even about those we do know, whether at work or at home. Our own judgment is tearing apart our ability to collaborate and communicate. It’s easy to feel disrespected. Without a shared understanding of respect, it’s harder to articulate how respect and disrespect can look and feel.

This book will give you an understanding of what Forms of Respect™ you value and how to communicate that to others.  The shared language I will teach you can help you collaborate with any group of people from coworkers to volunteers. While anyone can benefit from reading this book, I’ve targeted individual contributors, team managers, and executives. 

I wrote this book to illustrate that respect is relative and not absolute or universal. I want to help you stop wasting time guessing what you should do, and start learning what really matters to you and to others. You will build self-awareness and empathy. You’ll be able to focus your energy on your relationships to achieve greater impact. 

The book is designed for:

  • Those who want to increase their own self-awareness

  • Those who want to build trusting relationships

  • Those who want to lead diverse organizations more effectively

In this book, you will: 

  • Learn how to apply the 7 Forms of Respect™ 

  • Learn the difference between giving and getting respect

  • Reflect on the Forms of Respect™ that truly matter to you

  • Learn how to work with those who have different Forms of Respect™ 

The book is outlined as follows:

Part 1: The Dimensions

  • Give respect vs. get respect. How you demonstrate or give respect often differs from how we want to receive it.
  • What really matters to you. Move beyond what you should do. Ask yourself, what do you feel like you must do, could do, and won’t do.
  • Hierarchy. How do you interact with people who have more power, equal power, and less power than you? Do you treat them differently? Do you have different expectations?

Part 2: The 7 Forms of Respect™

  1. Procedure
  2. Punctuality 
  3. Information
  4. Candor
  5. Consideration
  6. Acknowledgment
  7. Attention

Part 3: How to use the 7 Forms of Respect™

  • How to work with those who have different Forms of Respect™
  • How to lead your organization 
  • How to apply the framework at home and at work

The book is filled with anecdotes and data from original and secondary research.

About the Author

Julie Pham, Ph.D. is CEO, CuriosityBased, which helps teams and organizations build connection, collaboration, and inclusion through fostering curiosity. She also advocates and promotes leadership narratives written by women and people of color.

Before starting CuriosityBased, she led community engagement at Washington Technology Industry Association, where she created the Ion Program, a cross-sector collaboration fellowship. She has also worked in marketing at Microsoft and Avidian Technologies. She got her “real-life MBA” by running her family’s Vietnamese-language newspaper, Northwest Vietnamese News, starting during the 2008 recession. Before turning to business, Dr. Pham lectured at UC Berkeley and Vietnam National University-Hanoi.

Dr. Pham serves as the Chair of the Leadership Tomorrow Curriculum Committee. She has served on the boards of Impact Hub Seattle, Social Venture Partners Seattle, MLK Business Association, National Association of Asian American Professionals, and the Community Involvement Commission (City of Seattle). She was honored as the winner of the 2019 Female Founders Alliance Champion Awards in the Advocate category, a member of the 2018 Harvard Business School's Young American Leaders Program, a 2015 German Marshall Memorial Fellow, and a 2011 Puget Sound Business Journal ’40 under 40’ honoree. 

She earned her Ph.D. in history at Cambridge University as a Gates Cambridge Scholar and graduated magna cum laude from UC Berkeley.

What We Need & What You Get

B.C. Allen Press will help produce the book. I set up the pre-order tiers to offset the costs of publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in October 2021.

  • The cover design of my book. 

  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this fall.

  • The automation of the results page for the assessment tool.

Risks and Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into the pricing.

I will personally mail the signed pre-sales copies of the books to you. You will get a survey at the end of the campaign to ensure I inscribe the book as you’d like.

The Impact

Your contribution will make it possible for me to get this work out into the world faster and without the time constraints of traditional publishing. 

You will get to be part of a movement in changing the conversation around respect. One day, you’ll hear people ask each other, “What are your Forms of Respect™? Mine are….” People will be able to approach each other with more empathy because they understand that others may have different ways of expressing respect.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everyone can contribute and there are other ways you can help. Most people hear about books from their friends or colleagues and I would love for you to tell yours:

  1. Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network.
  2. You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page. 
  3. Share to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who would enjoy the book, send them a text, tag them in a social post, send them an email, or give them a call. 

Thank you!

A magical journey through the artwork of the Peruvian textile artist Maximo Laura

This collection of 11 books compiles 40 years of Maximo Laura's creation.
In this first publication: PRE-SALE of volumes 1 and 2.

Un viaje mágico a través de la obra del artista textil peruano Máximo Laura

Esta colección de 11 libros recopila 40 años de creación de Máximo Laura.
En esta primera edición: PRE-VENTA de los volúmenes 1 y 2.

 

 

Our Project

  • We want to use the Indiegogo platform to pre-sell these first 2 High-Quality Art Books of the Máximo Laura Collection.
  • We are ready to print and we will make a first special edition only for those who buy this special pack.
  • Our minimum goal is to print 300 packs that will include volumes 1 and 2 + a printed  artwork signed by Maximo Laura.

Nuestro Proyecto

  • Queremos utilizar la plataforma Indiegogo para pre-vender estos 2 primeros libros de gran calidad de la Colección de Máximo Laura.
  • Estamos listos para imprimir y haremos una edición especial únicamente para quienes compren este pack especial.
  • Nuestro objetivo mínimo es imprimir 300 packs, que incluirán los volúmenes 1 y 2 + un grabado digital seriado y firmado por Máximo Laura.

 

 

The Books: Volumes 1 and 2

  • Size: 9.5 x 12.0 inches
  • 194 pages full color printed on 150 gr matt coated paper (each book)
  • Special bound with soft-touch cover finishing
  • Texts in English and Spanish

Los Libros: Volúmenes 1 y 2

  • Medidas: 24.0 x 30.5 centímetros
  • 194 páginas impresas a todo color sobre papel couché mate de 150 gr (cada libro)
  • Encuadernación especial con acabado soft-touch
  • Textos en inglés y español

 

 

 

Special Offer

We want to make it really interesting to participate in this pre-sale, that's why we have prepared benefits for all those who join the project at this stage:

Oferta Especial

Queremos que sea realmente interesante participar en esta pre-venta, por eso hemos preparado una serie de beneficios para todos los que se sumen al proyecto en esta etapa:

 

Shipping Rates

We will use the Amazon Logistics Platform for worldwide shipping.

This ensures efficiency in order handeling, and above all, very low shipping costs.

In addition, for those who buy in this pre-sale, we will give a discount on the shipping rate:

Tarifas de envío

Utilizaremos la Plataforma Logística de Amazon para los envíos a todo el mundo.

Esto garantiza eficiencia en la gestión y, sobre todo, unos costes de envío muy bajos.

Además, para los que compren en esta preventa, haremos un descuento en la tarifa de envío:

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We decided to use a crowdfunding platform to pre-sell our book because we want to guarantee the minimum fundraising that would ensure the printing of the book.

The all-or-nothing system offered by these platforms means that, if we reach our target of pre-selling 300 packs, we will raise the necessary funds to print and send the books to each of the people who has collaborated with us.

Riesgos y Desafíos

Hemos decidido utilizar una plataforma de crowdfunding para la preventa de nuestro libro porque queremos garantizar una recaudación mínima que asegure la impresión del libro.

El sistema de todo o nada que ofrecen estas plataformas significa que, si alcanzamos nuestro objetivo de preventa de 300 packs, recaudaremos los fondos necesarios para imprimir y enviar los libros a cada una de las personas que han colaborado con nosotros.

 

Timeline / Cronograma

 

Final Words / Palabras Finales

 

 

About Us / Sobre Nosotros

story:
Summary

Most people know me as a filmmaker (The Heart of the Game, The Bowmakers, etc.). Few however, know my background as a former CPA who ran off to the wilds of Alaska with a remarkable yellow Labrador named Woody in pursuit of a fierce freedom.

On the maiden voyage in our dogyak—a specially fitted kayak—Woody and l rounded a point into a half-moon bay with rugged coastline. There, sixteen miles from town on the rough, steep bank, accessible only by boat, sat a small gray house on stilts. In the shadow of ancient spruce and cedars, with a waterfall on one side and the ocean below, we took up a years-long vigil in the place I came to call Shakri-La.

This campaign is to raise support to publish my first book about this adventure: To Crack the World Open: Solitude, Alaska and a Dog Named Woody.

Why it Matters

This book is a life long dream come true. I’ve crafted it over the past 25 years. And I can’t realize it without a community that believes in dreams and the power of personal story to make this world a more habitable, kind and generous place.

You will help me launch an independent book that has the potential to create more connection and belonging in our world. A book that expresses the deep felt and poignant love of a dog that carries a message of inherent and personal freedom, a universal search that is as much exterior as it is interior.

In short, by becoming a producer of this book, you will help bring more understanding and soul into the world.

What I Need

This book will be published on November 2nd!

Publishing a book these days is an arduous and expensive ordeal. I need $15,000 to pay for the final copy editing and proofreading, the book cover and interior design, as well as marketing and promotion. In addition you will be funding the creation of a podcast, Chew The Bone with cosmic dog psychologist, Dr. Woody, as well as the design and launch of a book website.

I have secured the services of Girl Friday Productions, one of the leading indie publishers to get this work done. I wish to raise 50% of that amount or $7,500 through this campaign.

What You Get

You will be among the first in the world to own a first edition personally signed book. The street date for the book in November 2 and you will have yours in October before any one else does. I’ve added a bunch of other fun and meaningful perks for those inspired to help more.

Risks & Challenges

Beyond the financial challenges of creating this book, to lay one’s soul bare via a memoir is scary work. In order to write it, I had to delve into the recesses of the deepest trauma and address the raw vulnerabilities therein. At times, the writing brought me to my knees and opened floodgates of tears.

My work is based on stories that heal and inspire. I wouldn’t put this book out if not for the belief that it will create more connection and meaning in the world.

It is vulnerable to ask for help. It is vulnerable to ask for community. But the reward is deeper intimacy and inherent belonging.

I thank thee deeply.

Woof!

Other Ways You Can Help

A book only succeeds via word of mouth. I would adore it if you would share this with your dog loving friends or those who you feel would benefit from a story about the universal search for freedom.

Generating a unique post of Facebook, Instagram, Tik Tok or other media helps as well as a personal email to a friend.

Please ask you local bookstore to carry it.

Bless you!

-Ward

story:
Інфармацыя на беларускай мове ніжэй ↓

The campaign was successfully finished and our book is published! You can order a book through our websites: 

www.openbelarus.nl/13spirits

www.volhamilovich.com/13spirits

 

What we're asking you to fund

  • This campaign is a pre-sale to get sufficient fund (€4.500) to being able to publish our book, the story of 13 real Spirits from the Belarusian mythology
  • Hardcover book 23x23cm with 64 pages
  • The book will be printed bilingual in Belarusian & English
  • Our stories are for 6-99 year olds who are interested in the magical world of supernatural and in Belarusian cultural heritage
  • When we reach our target, we'll need about a month to print the book and start shippings
  • If we unexpectedly don't reach our target, and we won't find any alternative funding to fill up the budget, you'll get your money back and we won't print our book
  • With Covid in mind, we'll be very cautious to respect all rules and guidelines regarding distribution and postage

If this campaign is successful, later this year we will publish Dutch/Russian version.
Also we work on the second edition of the book 13. The Beings: Ancient and Eternal.

The Story

In the first book of the series 13. The Spirits. They are so close! Bye - the oldest Spirit on Earth, who knows all the legends, talks to 13 natural Spirits.

 

The Spirits tell him about their unusual, sometimes difficult, bodiless lives. They share what they fancy about people and what annoys them; what they do in nature and why.

 

Funny or sad, these Spirits often mirror people’s feelings and habits. 

 

The stories & characters are based on the beliefs of Belarusians collected from encyclopedic sources.

The book is not only about reading great stories. There are plenty of activities for kids and adults to practice languages, memory and DIY.

 

About us

It all started back in 2016, when two Belarusians creative minds met in Amsterdam: me, Tatsiana, Belarusian culture activist, mother of two and Volha, puppet theatre designer and illustrator. 
We have never lost our connection to the roots and, to the Slavic folk culture in particular, so we decided to share our passion with European and American public and, of course, with the expats. 
We studied encyclopedias and Belarusian classical literature sources, talked to older people to get to know their stories, draw the Spirits look and here we go: a wonderful selection of natural Spirits and Creatures stories was created!

Since I was a child, I remember songs about Bye and my grandmother’s stories about strange phenomena which took place in the fields and forests of Belarusian countryside from time to time.

Like, for instance, this one: on a usual day my grandmother’s family was heading home from another village and in the twilight they saw a weird creature walking along with them. When they stopped, the creature stopped too. It was changing its look from a stack of hay to a poorly built shed! Something impossible in the Soviet no-belief reality but... 

This and other stories of my grandmother have inspired me to learn more about Belarusian mythology and bring it back to life. If there are so many fantasy books with completely imaginary characters, why don’t tell children about thousands years old beliefs? While some of them are still even alive in the people’s hearts? 

Belarusian traditions and culture are not very famous abroad. It’s often overshadowed by Russian or Polish influences, which are all Slavic nations and have much in common, but there are still a lot of differences in how they see non-material life and its laws. It is nice to show children all the diversity and richness of world traditions and I hope this book will have an added value for children of any origin. 

Children are open to new things and in our time of digital short-clip information sharing it is important to cherish their reading skills, practicing other languages and creative perception - this is what we tried to incorporate into these books along with humour and mythology...

Наша кампанія завершана і кніга надрукаваная!

Вы можаце набыць кнігу праз: 

www.openbelarus.nl/13spirits

www.volhamilovich.com/13spirits

 

Прывітанне! 

  • Мы запрашаем вас узяць ўдзел у нашым праекце - выданні кніжкі аб 13 сапраўдных духах з беларускай міфалогіі
  • Гэтая кампанія з'яўляецца папярэднім продажам кнігі
  • Нам трэба сабраць 4500 еўра, каб мець магчымасць выдаць гэтую кнігу
  • Кніга ў цвёрдай вокладцы 23х23 см з 64 старонкамі высокай якасці і цудоўнымі ілюстрацыямі
  • Першае выданне будзе надрукавана на дзвюх мовах: беларускай і англійскай (паралельны тэкст), у наступным друку будзе магчыма набыць кніжку на нідэрландскай і рускай мовах
  • Кніжка будзе выдатным падарункам для дзяцей і дарослых (ад 6-99 гадоў), якія цікавяцца светам звышнатуральнага і беларускай культурнай спадчынай
  • Калі мэта дасягнута, нам спатрэбіцца каля месяца, каб надрукаваць кнігу і пачаць дастаўку
  • Калі па якім-небудзь абставінам мы не збяром неабходную на выданне суму, вы атрымаеце назад свае грошы
  • Улічваючы сітуацыю з Ковід-19, мы будзем дакладна выконваць усе рэкамендацыі, якія тычацца паштовых адпраўленняў

Гэтак жа мы працуем над другой часткай кнігі 13. Істоты: Старажытныя і Вечныя.

Гісторыя

У першай кнізе серыі 13. Духі. Заўсёды побач! Бай, самы старажытны Дух на Зямлі, які ведае напамяць ўсе легенды, размаўляе з 13 прыроднымі духамі.

Духі расказваюць яму пра сваё незвычайнае, часам цяжкае, бязцелеснае жыццё. Яны дзеляцца тым, што ім падабаецца у людзях і што іх раздражняе; чым яны робяць у прыродзе і чаму.

Смешныя ці сумныя, гэтыя Духі часта адлюстроўваюць пачуцці і звычкі людзей. Гісторыі і персанажы заснаваны на вераваннях беларусаў, сабраных з энцыклапедычных крыніц.

Дзеці і дарослыя змогуць убачыць неймаверна багатую спадчыну беларускай міфалогіі, адказаць на квіз Бая, знайсці новыя факты пра Духаў і многае іншае - усё ў лёгкай, гульнявой форме. Кніга 13 духаў. Заўседы побач. - гэта не толькі зборнік выдатных гісторый. У кніжцы шмат “развівалак” для дзяцей і дарослых, каб папрактыкавацца ў мовах, трэніраваць памяць і творчасць.

Пра нас

Усё пачалося яшчэ ў 2016 годзе, калі ў Амстэрдаме сустрэліся две творчыя беларускі: Таццяна, актывістка беларускай культуры і Вольга, дызайнер лялек і ілюстратар. Ніколі не губляючы сувязі з каранямі і, у прыватнасці,з славянскай народнай культурай, мы вырашылі падзяліцца сваім захапленнем з еўрапейскай і амерыканскай публікай і беларускімі эмігрантамі па ўсім свеце.
Мы вывучалі энцыклапедыі і крыніцы беларускай класічнай літаратуры, размаўлялі са сталымі людзьмі, каб пазнаёміцца ​​з іх гісторыямі, намаляваць хоць як прыкладна выглядаюць Духі.

Таццяна:

З дзяцінства я памятаю песні пра Бая (які ходзіць па сцяне..) і гісторыі маёй бабулі пра дзіўныя з'явы, якія час ад часу адбываліся ў беларускіх палях і лясах.
 
Як, напрыклад, вось такая гісторыя: аднойчы сям'я маёй бабулі накіроўвалася дадому з іншай вёскі, і ў прыцемках яны ўбачылі дзіўнае стварэнне, якое ішло побач з імі. Калі яны спыніліся, істота таксама спынілася. Яна мяняла свой выгляд - то была як стог сена, то як дрэнна пабудаваны хлеў! Нешта немагчымае ў той савецкай рэчаіснасці, дзе ніякай веры не было ўвогуле, а тут такое...
 
Гэтая і іншыя гісторыі маёй бабулі натхнілі мяне даведацца больш пра беларускую міфалогію і вярнуць яе да папулярнасьці. Калі ёсць так шмат кніг жанра фэнтазі з цалкам надуманымі персанажамі, чаму б не расказаць дзецям пра традыцыйных герояў, у якіх людзі верылі тысячагоддзі? А колькі яшчэ павер’яў жывыя ў сэрцах людзей!

За мяжой беларускія традыцыі і культура не вельмі вядомыя. Яны часта знаходзяцца ў цені рускага ці польскага уплыву, якія, зразумела, разам з іншымі славянскімі нацыямі маюць шмат агульнага. Але ўсё ж існуе шмат адрозненняў у тым, як яны бачаць нематэрыяльнае жыццё і яго законы. Хочацца паказаць дзецям усю разнастайнасць і багацце сусветных традыцый, і я спадзяюся, што гэтая кніга будзе мець дадатковую каштоўнасць для дзяцей любога паходжання.

Дзеці адкрыты для новага, і ў наш час дыгітальных тэхналогій, вельмі важна шанаваць іх навыкі чытання, разуменне іншых моваў і творчае ўспрыманне свету - мы паспрабавалі ўключыць усё гэта ў нашы кнігі разам з гумарам і міфалогіяй...

P.S. Нашы любімыя беларусы ў Беларусі! Нам вельмі хацелася, каб кніга была надрукаваная ў Беларусі, але па розных прычынах лягчэй аказалася зрабіць гэта ў Нідэрландах.
Мы разумеем, што зараз дастаўка з Нідэрландаў праз паштовы сервіс Indiegogo каштуе вельмі дорага. Але заўсёды ёсць выхад! Мы знайшлі варыянты як значна танней (€4) адпраўляць кнігі ў Беларусь. Але вам прыйдзецца крыху больш пачакаць.
Мы зробім усе магчымае каб кніжкі дайшлі да вас як мага хутчэй! Дзякуй вам за замовы! ❤️

The Spirits. They are so close! Bye - the oldest Spirit on Earth, who knows all the legends, talks to 13 natural Spirits. The Spirits tell him about their unusual, sometimes difficult, bodiless lives. story:
Summary

My name is Tim Collins and I am an adventure enthusiast and motorcycle traveller.

This project is a book I have been working on for the last few years and is finally coming to fruition. The book is called "Riding Through The Shadow" formerly titled "The Longest Thirty Miles" which was briefly available a few years back before I took it down to re-work some structural and editing issues. 

What You Get

The book is in the final stages of production and will be ready for shipping in the next few months. (Estimated shipping date is 6/31/2021)

Once the book goes live to the public autographed copies will be harder to come by, this pre-sale is an opportunity to get a signed copy with other perks too like stickers and your name in the book!!

The Impact

This book is the story of my personal struggles with addiction and my run-ins with suicide, depression and anxiety and how I used motorcycles and adventure to find a new lease on life. I think it is a valuable book to put out in the world and I am thrilled to be sharing it with you!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't want to take advantage of the pre-sales here that's ok! The book will be available on Amazon soon and you could always share this page with your friends!

story:
About My Book

Expired Mindsets is a call to action for those who are walking through life hiding the distance between what they outwardly show and what they inwardly believe. It is an opportunity to stop fighting against yourself, learning instead, to embrace the power of your story. 

Your past only holds the power you have given it. The sum of your circumstances don’t outweigh your potential, but only you can decide to stop holding yourself hostage. This book will challenge any part of you that has resigned to your current state and remind you that better is possible!

As you read this book, you will find the courage to lean in and acknowledge your unresolved places of pain. It will ignite your belief in your capacity for change, while helping you abandon the negative messages you’ve accumulated from the past. You will come away with a process of evaluation and growth that includes awareness, action, eviction, and alignment. As a result, your individual creativity, uniqueness, and resolve will have room to emerge and support your passions and purpose. 

Expired Mindsets is a nonfiction book that offers the following:

  • Authentic stories of challenge and triumph
  • A balanced blend of anecdotal stories from all walks of life
  • Current psychoeducation and research
  • Mindfulness exercises and reflection questions

The combination of these elements make it a valuable source for individuals, clinical professionals, and small group study.  It provides an intentional framework to help you synthesize the text and embody the shift you’re working to make. Be sure to note the package perks that include options for GUIDED MEDITATIONS (Audio) and MINDFULNESS EXERCISES (Video)!


You will love this book if you are looking for an integrative source of self-evaluation that addresses mental health and mindset from a mind and body approach. It is introspective and engaging from start to finish. 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Summer


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition.

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

About the Author 


Charryse Johnson is a somatically integrative mental health therapist, consultant, and keynote speaker with over 15 years of experience in the US and abroad. Although a self-proclaimed introvert, she has a magnetic way of connecting with people and encouraging them to believe in their worth. 

This book is an overflow of the passion Charryse has for creating mental health resources that are unique, accessible, and founded through whole-body integration. She believes that health and wholeness are a birthright we are all designed to experience. Her hope is to be a voice of inspiration that encourages others to heal, believe in their inner-strength, and walk in confidence.

In her spare time, Charryse loves spending time with her family, reading, and she’s a stage 5 Peloton owner (iykyk). She may have have a mild case of Amazon addiction and loves wearing yoga pants and statement tees. Her closest friends know she rarely sleeps and will answer their calls at any time. They also tease her for giving in to almost anything her kids want. 

For more information, you can connect with Charryse at chjohnson.therapist@gmail.com and on the following social media handles:
Linked In: Charryse Johnson LCMHC
FB: @expiredmindsets 
IG: @expired_mindsets
Twitter: @charryse_j

The Impact

Once the campaign is funded, a percentage of the excess funds will  go to the nonprofit, Leaves from Stella. 

"I was a freshman in college when I first learned of my mother’s Stage 4 cancer diagnosis. Navigating this loss, while still in my early 20s, changed the course of my life and thrust me into an overwhelming level of pain and responsibility. As you read, you will see the impact of her life and this season in my life. 


An organization like Leaves from Stella would have given me tangible support during a season of deep uncertainty. Volunteering and serving on the board is my way of turning my pain into purpose.

For more information on Leaves from Stella visit https://www.leavesfromstella.org

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #expiredmindsets and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Charryse Johnson

story:
A Novel About Music, People, East Nashville, and a Miracle

By John J. Thompson

    Hello from East Nashville. I’m excited to tell you about my new book. It’s my third book, but my first novel. It’s almost finished, but I’m going to need your help to get it across the finish line and into the world. This is a book I have been developing for nearly a decade.

    The story is about how music brings a diverse community of characters together to accomplish something miraculous when they least expect it. The book is based upon people I have known, pieces of stories I have heard, and is set right here in East Nashville. It even includes some real events from East Nashville history. However, this is really a musical fable. It’s a story about tragedy, gentrification, and reconciliation. It’s about Rock and Soul and Americana and Tejano and Gospel music setting an unlikely tribe of people on fire in the best possible way.
 

What We Need & Why

     I completed my first draft of this book more than a year ago. Since then, I have worked with two copy editors to hunt down typos, grammatical mistakes, and other errors that are difficult to see when you’re up to your eyeballs in a 98,000-word manuscript. (That's 210 pages in MSWord, at 12 point type, double spaced, for those who are curious.) Three revisions later, I have a draft that I feel pretty good about. But when I was working on my previous book, Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate, I learned that one thing a good publisher can bring to the process of releasing a book is the help of a different kind of editor.

     Unlike copy editors, who mostly focus on mechanics, these specialists look at "high level" stuff - structural things that can help the flow of the story. This type of editor can look at the manuscript from a 30,000-foot view and make suggestions that go way beyond grammatical errors. I have actually done this kind of editing for another writer, helping to refine a book that was released by a major publisher. I know and appreciate how this process works, but I can't do that kind of work for myself. I'm too close to the words. In much the same way that a record producer benefits an artist’s creative process by providing outside perspective, an effective editor is often the difference between a good book and a great one. This type of support costs money, though. I have found an excellent and proven editor who is excited to work with me on my book. I also need to hire a designer to help me make the thing look and feel as cool as possible. That also has a price tag. There are also technical aspects of publishing, marketing expenses, and more. And extra funds are something that 2020 made sure to relieve me of last year. 

     I’m not sure whether I will ultimately work with a publisher for distribution, self-publish, or possibly start my own imprint. I do know that I want to bring this story in for the best landing that I can manage. Your help will make that happen.
 

A Soundtrack?

     You may know that I have also been writing and recording music for more than 30 years. My "band" The Wayside has for many years consisted of my wife, Michelle Lynn Thompson, and myself along with a rotating cast of friends and contributors. The group is long overdue to release new music. Since this is a musical book – and I happen to have a fantastic musical partner by my side and lots of musical friends all around me –there will definitely be music connected to this project. I have already written three new songs that reflect elements of the story, and there are numerous cover songs discussed in the pages. If this fund-raising campaign is successful, some new music will come out as a sort of soundtrack to the book. The more support we raise, the more music we can make. One song will be released digitally to backers as a special thank you as soon as it is completed. Additional recording will happen as "stretch goals" once we meet our initial financial objectives. More information will be posted to backers and on my social media feeds as the campaign unfolds. 
 

How Does It All Work?     

     Those who back this campaign will help me finish the book, raise funds for its release and launch, and hopefully allow me to record some of the music from the story. In return, backers will get an early copy of the book in digital or physical form (or both) and some fun extras. You’ll be getting something rare, heartfelt, and very special. This will be something even more exclusive than a "first edition," to be sure. This is definitely more than a storefront, though. You're investing in me and helping to bring this story into the world. You are my patron. 

      Since there is a somewhat unlikely “band” at the center of this story, I’m making some very limited “merch” to accompany the campaign. Instead of having a T-shirt, mug, hat, or whatever swag with a book title on it, though, we’ll be making some fun merch that is taken from the story. I promise it will make more sense once you’ve read the book. I'll also be hosting different types of Zoom events and offering some personal one-on-one time for song critiques, consulting, writing coaching, or anything else I might be able to help you with. There’s even a level at which I’ll name a character after you or for you.

      Backers will also be added to a group of “insiders” who will receive excerpts from the book, “behind the scenes” reflections, reports from the journey to the finish line, access to a backers-only live stream event, and a digital copy to read before anyone else sees the book! There may even be some exclusive content from the book that only backers ever see – maybe an extra chapter or a bit of backstory. You’ll have to wait and see. I can’t let all of the secrets out just yet.

     I anticipate the early edition going to backers sometime this spring (estimating May 2021). If I decide to work with a publisher, the final release date could be later. But you’ll be among the first handful of people to get it directly from me.

      I’m setting the fundraising goal pretty low, but my vision is actually pretty big. If I can raise enough, the support will spill over into recording more music, having a promotional budget for the book, and maybe helping to set things up for my next book (already underway). So, back me if you can, as generously as you can, and know that your investment will be put to good use.
 

Instant Gratification! 

   I’ve chosen a special excerpt from the story that I will send to all backers shortly after your pledge is collected. I can’t guarantee that this excerpt won’t change when the book is finished, but I think you’ll enjoy it. I’m also planning to record an acoustic demo of one of the brand-new songs. I’ll send a streaming link to all backers as soon as that song is ready.
 

I'm Depending On You

     I would surely appreciate it if you would post this to your friends and family. Without a big budget for paid social media outlets, your posts really help. Just copy the URL and post it on Facebook, Twitter, or anywhere else. Thank you very much!

     If you can't support this campaign right now, I understand. Times are beyond tight for too many of us. So, please know that I appreciate your moral support. I appreciate you telling other people about this campaign. I appreciate your goodwill and positive energy and prayers. Once the book is out in the world, I'm sure we'll be able to find a way to get the story to anyone who wants to read it. Don't feel bad if you can't contribute now, and please don't contribute more than you can afford.
 

Risks & Challenges

     Although I have calculated the costs very conservatively, there are always risks associated with campaigns such as this. I am fortunate in that I have experience managing past crowdfunding campaigns, as well as a complicated merch program with my previous book. I'm not particularly worried about the risks related to the ability to fulfill our obligations to backers. One challenge will be the schedule, but I believe that has been mitigated to a great degree by waiting to launch this campaign until the book was nearly done. 

If you have any questions or concerns, just ask. Otherwise, jump in and then invite your friends to join you. This is going to be a fun journey for us to complete together!

     (If you're wondering if this is about the band founded by Michael Roe, Gene Eugene, Terry Taylor, and Derri Daugherty, it is not – although they do get mentioned. I am sure fans of those Lost Dogs will love this story. And yes, I checked with Mike, Terry, and Derri, and they are all cool with this title. There are other luminaries from the real-life musical underground that make appearances in this fictional story. You'll have to read the book to find out who.)
 

About The Author

     John J. Thompson has been championing, challenging, and celebrating art and artists since he was just a kid. He is a speaker, author, producer, artist, and music enthusiast who currently serves as a Creative Consultant, Writer, Music Supervisor, and Producer for various publishing companies, independent artists, films, and websites. John is the Associate Dean of the Trevecca School of Music and Worship Arts in Nashville. He served Capitol CMG Publishing as Director of Creative and Copyright Development for nearly a decade before joining Trevecca. Before that, he was on staff at the Cornerstone Festival in Illinois. In 2015 John wrote Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate; Crafting a Hand Made Faith in a Mass Market World for Zondervan/Harper Collins. Raised By Wolves; The Story of Christian Rock and Roll (ECW Press) arrived in 2000. John currently has several new books and records in development.

     Thompson recently re-launched TrueTunes.com, a website and podcast that he originally opened in 1989 as a record store, concert venue, and magazine. “This time around, True Tunes is about equipping and inspiring artists and creatives to function in any space, as much as it is about curating interesting, spiritually relevant music for a thoughtful audience,” he explains. “We’re all about searching for, and celebrating, the good, the true, and the beautiful, wherever we find it. We do that through music reviews, interviews, and playlisting. We’re also helping today’s songwriters to listen to better music, and listen to music better.” As the True Tunes Podcast has gotten off the ground, its mission is finding a global audience.

Quotes about JJT, Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate, True Tunes Podcast, etc…

“I’ve enjoyed reading John’s works for years. His writing is always insightful and thought-provoking on many levels. Personally, he was a huge help to me when I wrote Rebel for God.” (Eddie DeGarmo)

[Re: The True Tunes Podcast] JJT (and producer Bruce A, Brown) are creating an amazing piece of art themselves week to week, talking about other great art! I love their phrase “listen to better music, and listen to music – better.” I am reminded of some of the best music of my life here – but also have been introduced to amazing new stuff… (Chris Hauser)

“Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate is fresh and enlightening. John’s stories and his memories of discovering and rediscovering music and the power of the arts remind me that it is all spiritual as it weaves itself into the fabric of our lives. I see why the psalmist implores us to “taste and see that the Lord is good.” (Phil Keaggy, songwriter, recording artist, guitarist)

“In Jesus, Bread and Chocolate, John J. Thompson serves up a delectable mix of personal story, keen observations of evangelical culture, and scriptural reflection. The result is a filling and satisfying meal for the growing number of people in our churches who are starving for something more substantial than consumer Christianity.” (C. Christopher Smith, coauthor of Slow Church and editor of The Englewood Review of Books)

Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate: Crafting a Handmade Faith in a Mass-Market World  is a quick, pleasant read, enjoyable, full of great stories, even inspiring ones that brought tears to my eyes more than once. It, too, is an important voice calling us to some humane values and life-giving habits that are vital in our hyper-modern, digital age. (Byron Borger, Hearts and Minds Books)

“Thompson has a faithful heart and soul and a clear sense of what it means, as a person of faith, to move from that which is tasteless and unfulfilling about a mass-produced experience, whether in food, libation or worship, to something much more wholesome and unique. His book is a call to the same kind of uniqueness and authenticity in faith and worship. There is a twang in this author’s narrative that can be embraced just like a true bluegrass lyric or your mom’s best peach pie.” (Jennifer Burns Lewis, Englewood Review of Books)

“It’s rare to find a member of our industry who is as passionate and knowledgeable about both Black Gospel music and contemporary Christian music as John Thompson.  He is a true aficionado of all aspects of Christian music, from our earliest roots to the cutting edge of today’s independent and emerging scene. He has helped coordinate events, has served as a teacher of next generation artists, and has helped as a consensus builder with various aspects and cultures within our industry.” (Jackie Patillo, President & Executive Director; Gospel Music Association)

“John Thompson has been a true asset to The Recording Academy over the last decade that I have had the pleasure of working with him personally. Overseeing the Gospel/CCM awards process, I rely on experts such as John to decipher and uphold the integrity of the awards process. I am truly amazed to see someone who has this amount of passion for their craft.”  (Angela Jollivette, Senior Project Manager, Gospel & Visual Media Awards; The Recording Academy)

I am fortunate in that I have experience managing past crowdfunding campaigns, as well as a complicated merch program with my previous book. I'm not particularly worried about the risks related to the ability to fulfill our obligations to backers. One challenge will be the schedule, but I believe that has been mitigated to a great degree by waiting to launch this campaign until the book was nearly done. 

If you have any questions or concerns, just ask. Otherwise, jump in and then invite your friends to join you. This is going to be a fun journey for us to complete together!
     (If you're wondering if this is about the band founded by Michael Roe, Gene Eugene, Terry Taylor, and Derri Daugherty, it is not – although they do get mentioned. I am sure fans of those Lost Dogs will love this story. And yes, I checked with Mike, Terry, and Derri, and they are all cool with this title. There are other luminaries from the real-life musical underground that make appearances in this fictional story. You'll have to read the book to find out who.) 
About The Author
     John J. Thompson has been championing, challenging, and celebrating art and artists since he was just a kid. He is a speaker, author, producer, artist, and music enthusiast who currently serves as a Creative Consultant, Writer, Music Supervisor, and Producer for various publishing companies, independent artists, films, and websites. John is the Associate Dean of the Trevecca School of Music and Worship Arts in Nashville. He served Capitol CMG Publishing as Director of Creative and Copyright Development for nearly a decade before joining Trevecca. Before that, he was on staff at the Cornerstone Festival in Illinois. In 2015 John wrote Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate; Crafting a Hand Made Faith in a Mass Market World for Zondervan/Harper Collins. Raised By Wolves; The Story of Christian Rock and Roll (ECW Press) arrived in 2000. John currently has several new books and records in development.
     Thompson recently re-launched TrueTunes.com, a website and podcast that he originally opened in 1989 as a record store, concert venue, and magazine. “This time around, True Tunes is about equipping and inspiring artists and creatives to function in any space, as much as it is about curating interesting, spiritually relevant music for a thoughtful audience,” he explains. “We’re all about searching for, and celebrating, the good, the true, and the beautiful, wherever we find it. We do that through music reviews, interviews, and playlisting. We’re also helping today’s songwriters to listen to better music, and listen to music better.” As the True Tunes Podcast has gotten off the ground, its mission is finding a global audience.
Quotes about JJT, Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate, True Tunes Podcast, etc…
“I’ve enjoyed reading John’s works for years. His writing is always insightful and thought-provoking on many levels. Personally, he was a huge help to me when I wrote Rebel for God.” (Eddie DeGarmo)
[Re: The True Tunes Podcast] JJT (and producer Bruce A, Brown) are creating an amazing piece of art themselves week to week, talking about other great art! I love their phrase “listen to better music, and listen to music – better.” I am reminded of some of the best music of my life here – but also have been introduced to amazing new stuff… (Chris Hauser)
“Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate is fresh and enlightening. John’s stories and his memories of discovering and rediscovering music and the power of the arts remind me that it is all spiritual as it weaves itself into the fabric of our lives. I see why the psalmist implores us to “taste and see that the Lord is good.” (Phil Keaggy, songwriter, recording artist, guitarist)
“In Jesus, Bread and Chocolate, John J. Thompson serves up a delectable mix of personal story, keen observations of evangelical culture, and scriptural reflection. The result is a filling and satisfying meal for the growing number of people in our churches who are starving for something more substantial than consumer Christianity.” (C. Christopher Smith, coauthor of Slow Church and editor of The Englewood Review of Books)
Jesus, Bread, and Chocolate: Crafting a Handmade Faith in a Mass-Market World  is a quick, pleasant read, enjoyable, full of great stories, even inspiring ones that brought tears to my eyes more than once. It, too, is an important voice calling us to some humane values and life-giving habits that are vital in our hyper-modern, digital age. (Byron Borger, Hearts and Minds Books)
“Thompson has a faithful heart and soul and a clear sense of what it means, as a person of faith, to move from that which is tasteless and unfulfilling about a mass-produced experience, whether in food, libation or worship, to something much more wholesome and unique. His book is a call to the same kind of uniqueness and authenticity in faith and worship. There is a twang in this author’s narrative that can be embraced just like a true bluegrass lyric or your mom’s best peach pie.” (Jennifer Burns Lewis, Englewood Review of Books) 
“It’s rare to find a member of our industry who is as passionate and knowledgeable about both Black Gospel music and contemporary Christian music as John Thompson.  He is a true aficionado of all aspects of Christian music, from our earliest roots to the cutting edge of today’s independent and emerging scene. He has helped coordinate events, has served as a teacher of next generation artists, and has helped as a consensus builder with various aspects and cultures within our industry.” (Jackie Patillo, President & Executive Director; Gospel Music Association)
“John Thompson has been a true asset to The Recording Academy over the last decade that I have had the pleasure of working with him personally. Overseeing the Gospel/CCM awards process, I rely on experts such as John to decipher and uphold the integrity of the awards process. I am truly amazed to see someone who has this amount of passion for their craft.”  (Angela Jollivette, Senior Project Manager, Gospel & Visual Media Awards; The Recording Academy)

story:
This book is about my story.  A story about growing up with Vietnamese refugee parents in America who needed to figure out a path to a better life. Going from living out of my car while working at two KFCs and other side hustles to living in Switzerland while leading the launch of digital platforms across the globe. For girls with immigrant parents, low socio-economic status, or who are living in a difficult home situation, can identify themselves through my stories and realize that they, too, can rise up out of their situation and thrive.

 

 

 

                                                                                                     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

About the Author 

 

 

Help with Publishing Costs 

 

         

 

I started the writing process in 2019 and completed the manuscript in September 2020. So far $70,000 has been invested in developing content of the book to get accepted by Greenleaf Publishing and Fast Company.

In order to get it across the finish line and into the hands of girls and young women who can benefit from its message, an additional $50,000 is needed to cover publishing costs. This is where I would love your help. 

By supporting you can get up the following: 

  • Your personal signed copy 
  • Donate copies to underserved girls to inspire hope
  • Invitation to the book launch party, after COVID, either in the U.S. or in Europe, your choice
  • And much more depending on your sponsorship level!

 

The Impact

Your support can help get the message of discovering what you're capable of when you show up for yourself to as many underserved, underrepresented girls around the world as possible. For more details about the book you can check out janet-phan.com. 

Through my 1:1 long-term STEM mentoring non-profit organization started in 2016, Thriving Elements, we have been able to create access and opportunities for many underserved, underrepresented girls across the U.S and have begun global expansion spanning Switzerland, Uganda, Botswana, Nigeria, Tanzania, South Africa, and India. This book complements the work of Thriving Elements to further develop and empower girls and young women globally. 

 

Challenges

One of the challenges is that the target audience of the book, underserved girls, are likely not able to afford the book. We plan  to overcome this hurdle through a buy one, give one concept. 

The other challenge is that I ain’t no Michelle Obama. My team and I plan to spread the message of hope to reach various outlets through grassroots PR efforts. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that this may be a tough time to contribute, however, here are some ways we can use your help:  

  • Spread the word to your network about this campaign. 
  • Ask the company you work for to sponsor books for the girls. 
  • Volunteer with your skills. There’s a lot of work behind the scenes from operational to legal to business development so we can use your help!

UPDATES

Check the "Updates" tab above for the latest news! 

 

Overview

The Anthology of Prayer is an Eastern Orthodox prayer book which for the first time in English incorporates the Book of Hours with a significant selection of fundamental hymns and prayers from the Church's liturgical cycles. This provides the ordinary Christian at home with a form of the rich prayers of the Church in a single, affordable, pocket-sized book, much as the Breviary does for Western Christians.

Why another prayer book?

While there are abundant prayer books available, with new ones appearing all the time, seemingly tailor-made for virtually every demographic, we wanted to get back to the basics. 

The Church's cycle of daily prayers is for everyone, and predates every prayer book. We know from ancient sources that for large portions of the Church's history, it was expected that everyday Christians would pray the Daily Office at home or at church: Matins, the Hours, and Vespers. But with few parish churches today offering anything close to a daily cycle of services, the serious layman must maintain the prayers at home.

The Book of Hours (Horologion) is available from other publishers, but we have found that none really incorporate the Church's liturgical cycles into the prayers, rather offering only the basic frameworks. Yet in her wisdom, the Church has found a certain amount of variety is needed to bring richness to the prayers, keeping the Daily Office from becoming stale and difficult to maintain.

The challenge is this:

  • A single book offers very little of the variation of the Church's liturgical cycles.
  • A complete liturgical library is beyond the means of most ordinary people. 

We need something in between these two extremes. And the Church offers it: a book called the Anthologion. Before the rise of cheap publishing, many parishes only owned this single book, which offered an anthology, or simplified selection, of the full body of Church hymns. In modern times this text has fallen out of use, but it is an ideal solution for the ordinary Christian at home.

Essentially similar to the Breviary of Western Christianity, the Anthology of Prayer (Anthologion) is a simplified selection of the Church's liturgical texts, designed so any person, with just a little study, could maintain the daily cycle of prayers at home, with its fundamental daily variations: the 8-week tone cycle, major feast days, and the Lenten and Paschal seasons.

The Anthology's opportunities can grow along with the individual's own spiritual growth. Perhaps one might begin with just one or two of the Hours per day: they are brief and simple. Over time, one might begin to add other prayers, all within the Church's ancient structure, avoiding too much freedom in a buffet of prayers, or too little freedom in a static set of prayers.

We think the Anthology of Prayer is the golden mean, accessible to all and offering a great amount of flexibility and rich variety for the development of one's prayer life, while keeping traditional and firmly-established borders and frameworks, avoiding the fragmentation of our common prayer that comes about through a great variety of books.

And in an age of pandemics, civil unrest, and uncertainty, it is a comfort to have the firm foundation of the Church's prayer life at our fingertips. While we might choose to depend on  Internet resources, even that is precarious, and not ideal.

Our basic desire was to enable the ordinary Christian to carry on a form of the Church's prayers with only a single small book. We think we have accomplished this, with God's help.

Features

These are subject to change, but this is our current intention:

  • Over 1000 pages of sacred prayers, scriptures, and hymns, comprising the basic bedrock of Orthodox prayer and worship, including:

    • The Horologion (Book of Hours), with all Lenten variations for year-round use
    • The Octoechos (Book of Eight Tones), the daily hymns and prayers of the fundamental 8-week cycle
    • The General Menaion (Feast day services), hymns and prayers of the yearly cycle
    • Selections from the Triodion and Pentecostarion, hymns and prayers of the Lent-Pascha cycle
  • 4.75x7 inches, the size of standard pocket Bibles
  • Beautifully gilded page edges
  • Two-tone red and black printing – readable 10 pt text with a specially-selected font for smaller type sizes
  • Four ribbon bookmarks
  • Designed for Pan-Orthodox use
  • Abundant supporting material and clear instructions – with a little initiative and study, anyone can carry on the prayers of the Church in any circumstances with just a single book 

What we need

We are seeking $10,000 to have 2,000 copies of the Anthology printed. 90% goes to hard printing costs, and the rest will offset Indiegogo's processing fees and enable us to finish up the last stage of editing.

What you get

Contributors will receive printed copies of the book and their name printed on the "Thank You" page, along with our gratitude.

If we don't raise the full amount, we will set aside the funds and continue our fundraising efforts outside of Indiegogo until we are able to proceed with the project. But we hope to accomplish this within Indiegogo's 60 day window.

Other ways you can help

If you can't contribute right now, we invite you to share this page with your friends and family. And we ask for your prayers, as such a significant undertaking comes with spiritual challenges as well. Thank you for your kind support!
